Subject: Grid refining exceeds max points but keeps going

How does one limit the max number of grid points?

I have OneDim Solve running in Python on both grad and curv 0.01 or 
so. It reports that the grid size exceeded max number of 300, it 
keeps going, adding a few points at a time, gets well over 5000, 
makes computer unresponsive, and finnaly crashes it, filling the disk.

Zoran
